name: Font of Magic
effects: you gain Sorcery Points as shown on the class table
you regain all expended Sorcery Points when you finish a long rest
you can convert spell slots into Sorcery Points (no action)
you can create spell slots as a bonus action using Sorcery Points (see class table); created slots vanish on long rest
limits: you cannot have more Sorcery Points than the number shown for your level
you can create spell slots no higher than level 5
